maqras.text: 23|36|Son'na yakusoku wa mattaku ari emasen.
23|37|Watashi-tachi ni wa, gense no seikatsu no soto wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa shinde mata ikikaerudeshou ka. Watashi-tachi wa, kesshite yomigaera sa reru koto wa nai nodesu.
23|38|Kare wa arra ni tsuite, kyogen o netsuzo shita tada no ningen ni sugimasen. Watashi-tachi wa, kare o shinjimasen.'
23|39|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to imasu. Do ka o tasuke kudasai.'
23|40|Kare wa ose rareta. `Shibaraku shitara, kare-ra wa kanarazu kuirudearou.'
23|41|Sorede hitokoe (chobatsu) ga kakujitsu ni kare-ra o osoi, ware wa kare-ra o (tokinonagare ni ukabu) awa kuzu ni shita. Dakara aku o okonau mono yo tozakare.
23|42|Sore kara kare-ra no nochi ni, ware wa soto no sho sedai o tsukutta.
23|43|Dare mo sono sadame rareta kigen ni,-saki ni suru koto mo okureru koto mo dekinai.

23|44|Sokode ware wa tsugitsugini shito o noko wa shita. Daga shito ga hitotsu no min ni arawareru tabi ni, kare-ra wa kare o usotsuki yobawari shita. Sorede ware wa (ko no yona fugi no to o) tsugitsugini ato o owa se,(horoboshi), kare-ra o mukashi no katari kusa ni shita. Dakara shinko shinai mono yo tozakare.
23|45|Mata ware wa, waga shuju no shirushi to meiryona ken'i to o sazukete, musa to sono kyodai no harun o noko wa shita.
23|46|Firuaun to sono choro-tachi no moto ni. Daga kare-ra wa oheide omoi nobotta-sha-tachideatta.
23|47|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi doyo ni ningen ni suginai futari o (doshite) shinji raremashou ka. Shikamo kare-ra no min wa, watashi-tachi no doreide wanaidesu ka.'
23|48|Sore de kare-ra wa, ryonin o usotsukidearu to i, kekkyoku horobosa reta.
23|49|Ware wa, kare-ra ga tadashiku michibika reru yo, musa ni shikato Keisuke (rippo) o sazuketa.
23|50|Mata ware wa, maruyamu no ko to sono haha o shirushi to nashi, ryonin o izumi no waki deru anseina oka no ue ni sumawa seta.
23|51|Anata gata shito-tachi yo, yoi kiyoi mono o tabe, yoi okonai o shi nasai. Ware wa anata gata no suru koto o jukuchi shite iru.
23|52|Hontoni anata gata no kono unma wa, yuiitsu no kyodotaidearu. Ware wa anata gata no omodearu. Ware o osoreyo.
23|53|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa sho shuha ni bunretsu shita. Shikamo kaku-ha wa jibun-tachi ga subarashi to itte iru.
23|54|Dakara tobun'nokan, mayoi no mama ni kare-ra o hochi shi nasai.
23|55|Kare-ra wa ware ga, zaiho to shijo de kare-ra o chikaradzukeru to kangaeru no ka.
23|56|Ware wa kare-ra no tame ni, yoikoto o isoide iru to omou no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa (kokoromi ni) kidzukanai.
23|57|Hontoni omo o osorete ononoku mono,
23|58|mata omo no shirushi o shinjiru mono,
23|59|mata omoni (nanimono o mo) hai shinai mono,
23|60|mata omoni kaeru koto o kokoro ni osore, ataerubeki mono o ataeru mono,
23|61|korera no mono wa subete zenji ni isogi, sono sentonitatsu-shadearu.
23|62|Ware wa darenimo, sono noryoku ijo no omoni o owa senai. Ware ni wa shinjitsu o kataru shomotsu ga aru node, kare-ra wa kesshite futo ni atsukawa reru koto wa nai nodearu.
23|63|Iya, kare-ra no kokoro wa kore (kuruan no oshie) o mattaku rikai dekinaide iru. Tokorode kare-ra no koi wa, sore yori hidoi okonaidearu.
23|64|Yagate ware ga, kare-ra no naka no zeitakuna mono o chobatsu no tame ni toraeru to, miruga i. Kare-ra wa nakisakebu.
23|65|(Sonotoki ose rareyou. ) `Imasara aigan shite wameku koto wanai. Anata gata ni wa ware kara no kyujo wa nai nodearu.
23|66|Ware no shirushi wa, anata gata ni dokuju sa rete itaga, anata gata wa kakato o kaeshite nige,
23|67|komandeatta. Kore (kuruan) ni tsuite waruguchi o itte yawa ni fukette ita.'
23|68|Kare-ra wa, kono o kotoba o jukuko shinai no ka. Mukashi no sosen ni okoranakatta mono ga, kare-ra ni okoru to kangaeru no ka.
23|69|Soretomo kare-ra e no shito to mitomezu, kare o kyohi suru no ka.
23|70|Sore de,`kare wa tsuka reta monodearu.' To iu no ka. Sode wanai. Kare wa shinri o motarashitaga, kare-ra no oku wa shinri o kirau.

23|71|Moshi shinri ga, kare-ra no yokubari ni fusawashi mononara, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono wa,(konran shi) taihai shite shimattadearou. Sode wanai. Ware wa kare-ra e no kunkai o sazuketaga, kare-ra wa kunkai kara somuki satta nodearu.
23|72|Soretomo anata wa, hoshu o kare-ra ni motomeru no ka. Anata no omo no hoshu koso wa shijodearu. Kare wa mottomo sugureta kyuyo o ataeru kata de ara reru.
23|73|Hontoni anata wa, tadashi michi ni kare-ra o maneku.
23|74|Daga raise o shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, kanarazu sonomichi kara hagureru.
